Anthropologie.description: A lifestyle brand providing a curated mix of clothing, accessories, and home decor.

Urban Outfitters.description: A retail brand offering a variety of fashion, accessories, and home products.

West Elm.description: A modern furniture and home decor brand with a focus on sustainable and stylish designs.

World Market.description: An eclectic retailer offering a wide range of unique home furniture, decor, and international goods.

Serena & Lily.description: A brand known for its sophisticated and casual collection of home decor, furniture, and bedding.

Jungalow.description: A design and lifestyle brand that offers vibrant and bohemian-inspired home goods.

Lulu and Georgia.description: An online shop offering a curated selection of stylish furniture, decor, and accessories.

The Citizenry.description: A brand that collaborates with artisans globally to create well-crafted home decor and furniture.

Target.description: A retail corporation providing a wide range of goods, including home essentials and decor.

Amara.description: A luxury home furnishings and accessories retailer with a focus on elegant and modern designs.
